title: 820-3478, Fan spins no chime Black screen
message:
i have a 820-3478 which Fan spins but don't chime and only black screen
first 2 LED lights up,
CPU Vcore 1.7V
GPU Vcore 0.8V
PLT_RST_L 3.3V
no shorts detected 

is this GPU issue? resistance on gpu core is 20ohms same goes to CPU as well.

title: 820-3478, Fan spins no chime Black screen
message:
Any history available?
Did you try SMC reset?
Can also test disconnecting CMOS cell.

Try known good BIOS, before GPU reflow (for test).

title: 820-3478, Fan spins no chime Black screen
message:
no history other than it just suddenly died.
yes tried SMC reset as well.
i thought PLT_RST_L signal indicates that BIOS loadout is complete and CPU is talking to EFI? anyway i will try finding for the a clean BIOS first
